author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Pousada Condeixa Coimbra proposes memorable autumn breakTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Pousada Condeixa Coimbra proposes memorable autumn break
Indulge yourself a family break this autumn and witness a never-ending sunset in a special place with tradition and once a stage of the Napoleonic invasions. With a 95 EUR/night rate for a Double Standard Room, Pousada Condeixa Coimbra proposes a memorable stay for 2 adults, where children (up to 2 and under 12 years old) stay for free. Already available at Pousada Condeixa Coimbra for bookings and stays until November 15th, this offer allows late check-out/early check-in (depending on availability).
Enjoy the amazing garden and an unexpected terrace over the natural landscape of Condeixa, taste our cuisine with strong regional influences and ingredients and take advantage of the fireplace on the drawing room to have an aperitif watching a never-ending autumn sunset on the horizon.
